definition: surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites

sentences.english: Bin Laden's then-bodyguard claimed to have delivered the dowry.
sentences.chinese: 本拉登的前保镖则声称，他曾帮忙给新娘家寄过彩礼。

sentences.english: The tradition of lobola was a matter of pride.
sentences.chinese: “新娘彩礼”的传统实际上是一个尊严的问题。

sentences.english: Today, lobola is often given in cash.
sentences.chinese: 如今，“新娘彩礼”常常是用现今来支付的。

sentences.english: KAKULE: "I went to my girlfriend's family to propose marriage, but I had nothing to give for a dowry."
sentences.chinese: 我去女朋友家家里提亲，但我没什么可以作为彩礼。

sentences.english: When it comes to "betrothal gift", we are most familiar with it.
sentences.chinese: 提起彩礼，我们最熟悉不过了。

sentences.english: Many people, including many women, support payment of lobola .
sentences.chinese: 许多人，包括许多妇女都赞成支付“新娘彩礼”。

definition: betrothal money (given to the bride's family)
the bridegroom's side/of the bridegroom's family
gift money (on the occasion of a wedding etc)
the bride's side (of a wedding)/of the bride's party
to get oneself a wife/to take a daughter-in-law
dowry/to give as a dowry/to accompany sb
to break a promise of marriage
